about.title: ABOUT <1>NEOVERTEX</1>
about.description: NeoVertex is a high-performance consultancy specializing in business transformation through strategic intelligence and advanced technology. Our approach combines three fundamental pillars:

vision.title: EXTERNAL STRATEGIC VISION
vision.description: Focusing on day-to-day problems often makes innovative solutions invisible. We bring the external view that transforms operational challenges into growth levers.

tech.title: Tailored Technology
tech.description: We develop AI Agents and exclusive systems for your business

execution.title: Relentless Execution
execution.description: We transform strategy into measurable results

philosophy.quote: At NeoVertex, we believe that every company has untapped potential. Our mission is to reveal this potential through a surgical external view combined with cutting-edge technology. We are not just consultants - we are the architects of your next growth phase.
philosophy.author: Nelson Araujo, CEO & Founder

vision.title: Outside View, Inside Results
vision.description: While you are immersed in the day-to-day, we see the complete picture. We identify hidden bottlenecks, lost opportunities, and unexplored paths.

tech.title: Technology That Speaks Your Language
tech.description: We develop AI Agents and systems that understand the nuances of your business. Every line of code is thought out to solve your specific challenges.

consulting.title: Executive Consulting, Not Theoretical
consulting.description: Our consultants have entrepreneurial DNA. They have already built, scaled, and sold companies. We know what works because we have made it work.

roi.title: Guaranteed ROI
roi.description: Our projects pay for themselves. We measure success in revenue increase, cost reduction, and operational efficiency gain.

phases.title: PHASE 1: 360° DIAGNOSIS
items: Deep analysis of processes, people, and technology
Benchmarking with leaders in your sector

phases.title: PHASE 2: CUSTOMIZED STRATEGY
items: Action plan with quick wins and structural projects
Definition of KPIs and clear goals

phases.title: PHASE 3: ASSISTED IMPLEMENTATION
items: Development of systems and AI tailored to you

phases.title: PHASE 4: SCALE AND OPTIMIZATION
items: Preparation for the next growth cycle

services.title: DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION THAT DRIVES RESULTS
services.subtitle: From strategic consulting to web development, we are the complete partner to accelerate your growth. We unite business intelligence and advanced technology to take your company to the next level of performance and profitability.
services.slogan_text: Reach your Peak. Connect technology and strategy to achieve extraordinary results.

consulting.title: STRATEGIC CONSULTING
consulting.description: Deep analysis of your business with precise diagnostics and customized action plans. Our team identifies growth and optimization opportunities, ensuring data-driven decisions and measurable results.

branding.title: Branding Creation
branding.description: We build a unique visual and verbal identity for your brand. From the logo to the tone of voice, we ensure your company conveys authority, earns public trust, and stands out from the competition.

pricing.title: Pricing Strategy
pricing.description: We define the ideal price for your products and services, balancing competitiveness and profit margin. We analyze costs, perceived value, and demand to maximize your profitability.

actionPlan.title: Action Plan
actionPlan.description: We deliver not just reports, but a clear execution roadmap. We define goals, deadlines, and owners, transforming strategy into practical tasks to ensure growth happens.

marketResearch.title: Market Research
marketResearch.description: We deeply map your niche and competitors. We identify trends, threats, and unexplored opportunities so you are always one step ahead in the business game.

ai.title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE & AUTOMATION
ai.description: Revolutionize your operation with the power of Artificial Intelligence. We develop autonomous agents and automations that work 24/7 for your company - reducing operational costs, eliminating administrative errors, and freeing your team to focus on what truly matters: strategy and growth.

agents.title: Intelligent Agents
agents.description: Advanced chatbots and virtual assistants that sell, support, and serve 24 hours a day, using natural language and continuous learning.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: Software robots (RPA) that execute repetitive and bureaucratic tasks with superhuman speed, drastically cutting your operational costs.

data.title: Predictive Analytics
data.description: Algorithms that transform your raw data into precise sales predictions and trends, enabling early strategic decisions.

generative.title: Generative AI
generative.description: Solutions for automated content creation, coding, or design, scaling your creative production without losing quality.

systems.title: SYSTEMS DEVELOPMENT
systems.description: Forget manual spreadsheets and rigid software. We create the operating system tailored to your business. Centralize finance, inventory, HR, and sales intp a single, secure platform accessible from anywhere, designed exclusively for your workflows.

erp.title: Custom ERP
erp.description: A management core made to measure to integrate all departments of your company, eliminating information silos and rework.

crm.title: CRM & Sales Management
crm.description: Powerful tools to track every lead, visualize your sales funnel, and ensure no business opportunity is lost.

api.title: API Integration
api.description: We connect all your current software (banks, marketing, logistics) into a unified ecosystem where data flows automatically.

dashboards.title: Real-Time Dashboards
dashboards.description: Visual and intuitive panels showing your business's most important KPIs instantly, for visible management and total control.

websites.title: WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT
websites.description: Your digital storefront needs to be more than pretty: it needs to sell. We create high-performance websites, online stores, and landing pages optimized for conversion. We combine premium design, extreme speed, and best SEO practices to turn visitors into loyal customers.

uiux.title: Premium UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Interfaces designed to enchant and retain. We focus on the user journey to ensure fluid, intuitive, and aesthetically flawless navigation.

seo.title: SEO & Performance
seo.description: Advanced technical optimization so your site loads instantly and conquers the top positions on Google, attracting qualified traffic.

ecommerce.title: Scalable E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Robust, secure online stores ready to sell. Full integration with payments, logistics, and marketing tools to scale your sales.

responsive.title: Total Responsiveness
responsive.description: Your site perfect on any screen. We ensure a consistent and incredible user experience, whether on desktop, tablet, or smartphone.

marketing.title: DIGITAL MARKETING & GROWTH
marketing.description: Complete digital marketing strategies to accelerate your growth. SEO, social media management, paid campaigns, and data analysis to position your brand and multiply your sales.

support.title: TECHNICAL SUPPORT & TRAINING
support.description: Continuous monitoring and specialized training for your team. We ensure you extract the maximum potential from all implemented solutions, with dedicated 24/7 support.
